definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
Bulgaria/Bulgarian/abbr. for 保加利亞|保加利亚[Bao3 jia1 li4 ya4]
to defend/to protect/to keep/to guarantee/to ensure/civil administration unit in the baojia 保甲[bao3 jia3] system (old)
butchering one another as fish and flesh (idiom); killing one another/internecine strife
always at loggerheads (idiom); never able to agree with sb/unable to get on with sb
classical final particle, similar to modern 了[le5]
young fellow countryman/young person from the same village
relatives/members of the same family, clan, tribe etc
see 矯枉過正|矫枉过正[jiao3 wang3 guo4 zheng4]
